input.label: Select a Module (required):
input.populatingSearch: | inputlookup netatmo_stations | search station="$station$" | fields module_name

single.title: Current Indoor Temperature
single.searchString: | tstats prestats=t values(Netatmo_Data.temperature) AS temperature from datamodel=Netatmo where Netatmo_Data.station="$station$" Netatmo_Data.type_label="Base Station" by _time | sort - _time | stats first(Netatmo_Data.temperature) as temperature, last(Netatmo_Data.temperature) AS last_temp | eval change=round(temperature-last_temp, 1) | eval trendClass=if(change>0,"increase","decrease") | eval change=if(change>0,tostring("+".change."°C"),tostring(change."°C")) | fields - last_temp

single.title: Current Outdoor Temperature
single.searchString: | tstats prestats=t values(Netatmo_Data.temperature) AS temperature from datamodel=Netatmo where Netatmo_Data.station="$station$" Netatmo_Data.type_label="Outdoor Module" by _time | sort - _time | stats first(Netatmo_Data.temperature) as temperature, last(Netatmo_Data.temperature) AS last_temp | eval change=round(temperature-last_temp, 1) | eval trendClass=if(change>0,"increase","decrease") | eval change=if(change>0,tostring("+".change."°C"),tostring(change."°C")) | fields - last_temp

single.title: Current Pressure
single.searchString: | tstats prestats=t values(Netatmo_Data.pressure) AS pressure, values(Netatmo_Data.pressure_area) from datamodel=Netatmo where Netatmo_Data.station="$station$" Netatmo_Data.type_label="Base Station" by _time Netatmo_Data.pressure_area | sort - _time | stats first(Netatmo_Data.pressure) as pressure, last(Netatmo_Data.pressure) AS last_pressure, first(Netatmo_Data.pressure_area) AS pressure_area | eval change=round(pressure-last_pressure, 1) | eval trendClass=if(change>0,"increase","decrease") | eval change=if(change>0,tostring("+".change."hPa"),tostring(change."hPa")) | fields - last_pressure

single.title: Current Indoor Humidity
single.searchString: | tstats prestats=t values(Netatmo_Data.humidity) AS humidity from datamodel=Netatmo where Netatmo_Data.station="$station$" Netatmo_Data.type_label="Base Station" by _time | sort - _time | stats first(Netatmo_Data.humidity) as humidity, last(Netatmo_Data.humidity) AS last_humidity | eval change=round(humidity-last_humidity, 1) | eval trendClass=if(change>0,"increase","decrease") | eval change=if(change>0,tostring("+".change."%"),tostring(change."%")) | fields - last_humidity

single.title: Current Outdoor Humidity
single.searchString: | tstats prestats=t values(Netatmo_Data.humidity) AS humidity from datamodel=Netatmo where Netatmo_Data.station="$station$" Netatmo_Data.type_label="Outdoor Module" by _time | sort - _time | stats first(Netatmo_Data.humidity) as humidity, last(Netatmo_Data.humidity) AS last_humidity | eval change=round(humidity-last_humidity, 1) | eval trendClass=if(change>0,"increase","decrease") | eval change=if(change>0,tostring("+".change."%"),tostring(change."%")) | fields - last_humidity

chart.title: Humidity vs. Temperature ($module_name$)
chart.searchString: | tstats prestats=t avg(Netatmo_Data.temperature) AS temperature, avg(Netatmo_Data.humidity) AS humidity from datamodel=Netatmo where Netatmo_Data.station="$station$" Netatmo_Data.type_label="*" Netatmo_Data.module_name="$module_name$" by Netatmo_Data.device, _time span=30m | timechart bins=50 span=30m avg(Netatmo_Data.humidity) AS Humidity, avg(Netatmo_Data.temperature) AS Temperature

chart.title: Hourly Average vs. Daily Min/Max Temperature ($module_name$)
chart.searchString: | tstats prestats=t avg(Netatmo_Data.temperature) AS temperature from datamodel=Netatmo where Netatmo_Data.station="$station$" Netatmo_Data.type_label="*" Netatmo_Data.module_name="$module_name$" by Netatmo_Data.device, _time span=1h | timechart span=1h avg(Netatmo_Data.temperature) AS "Hourly Average" | append [| tstats prestats=t max(Netatmo_Data.temperature) AS temperature from datamodel=Netatmo where Netatmo_Data.station="$station$" Netatmo_Data.type_label="*" Netatmo_Data.module_name="$module_name$" by _time span=1d | timechart max(Netatmo_Data.temperature) AS "Daily Maximum" ] | append [| tstats prestats=t min(Netatmo_Data.temperature) AS temperature from datamodel=Netatmo where Netatmo_Data.station="$station$" Netatmo_Data.type_label="*" Netatmo_Data.module_name="$module_name$" by _time span=1d | timechart min(Netatmo_Data.temperature) AS "Daily Minimum" ] | sort _time
